Icon.ToolTip: {Lang("An Engine or a list of Engines, used to get the Engine Client to perform queries in the thread groups")}
{Lang("First available: first available Engine from the list (ping ok). Random: load balance the queries between the Engines from the list")}
{Lang("Thread groups will be executed in parallel.")}
{Lang("Thread group name, used in logs and output file")}

{Lang("Support only select statment. You can use variables in this field with the following syntax $myvar$ where myvar is the variable name. These variables will be replaced by values from the "parameter file".")}

{Lang("Custom file containing the variable name in the header (first line). Each subsequent line will represent a set of values. NOTE: The variables names must not include $ signs and lines must have the same number of values as defined in the header")}
{Lang("Separator used in "Parameter file". Type: char. Default: ;")}

{Lang("Strategy to read values from "Parameter file". Values are pulled by line, the strategy define what line values is used to replace the variables in the SQL. Ordered: threads will read lines from top to bottom. Random: read in random order")}
{Lang("If checked, add user ACLs in the SQL query. Using the same strategy as defined for "Parameter strategy" (Ordered or Random)")}
{Lang("Number of parallel threads, each thread will execute a SQL query. Default: 5")}
{Lang("Define min and max boundaries in seconds before a thread execute SQL query. Values are in seconds. Syntax: min;max. Default: 3;10 ")}
{Lang("Maximum execution time in seconds. Once execution time is reached, stop all threads execution. Default: 60")}
{Lang("Maximun number of iterration (SQL queries executed). Once max iterations is reached, stop all threads execution. Default: 100")}

{Lang("Legacy: Full security clause (identities and groups) are sent as part of the SQL query. Engine: only user identity is sent as part of the SQL query. Please note, Engine security requires version >= 11.3.0 ")}
{Lang("Security domain used to get users id or user name")}
{Lang("You can use both a user ID or a user name")}
{Lang("Folder to store output files (Queries, Cursor size breakdown, Dump and Engine activity). Folder name: <commandName>_<datetime>")}
{Lang("Seperator used within the output CSV files. Type: char. Default: \t")}

{Lang("Create '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file(s) within the '<OutputFolder>'. CSV will contains [Thread Group Name][Iteration][Date Start][Date End][Success][Engine name][Cursor Size] and any other information based on what you selected below. Default: true")}

{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [sql]. Default: false. NOTE: This can make the output file very big especially if you have a long query or lot of ACLs for users")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [TotalQueryTime][ProcessingTime][RowFetchTime][ReadCursor]. Default: true")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [CacheHit][MatchingRowCount][PostGroupByMatchingRowCount]. Default: true")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [ClientFromPool][ClientToPool]. Default: true")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [Curosr Network and Deserialization]. Default: true")}

{Lang("Add values from parameter file used to replace variables in the SQL query to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file. If your thread group use User ACLs", the user full name will be displayed. Default: true")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [SearchRWA][FullTextSearchRWA] duration per Engine/Index. Default: false")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [ExecuteDBQuery] and [FetchingDBQuery] duration per Engine/Index. Default: false")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [Distribution] and [Correlation] durations per Engine. Default: false")}

{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [AcqMRdLk][AcqDBRdLk][NetworkNotificationToWorkerStart][MsgDeserialize][QueryProcessorParse] durations. Default: false")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [Broker Engine][Client Engine(s)] and [MergeAttributes] duration. Default: false")}
{Lang("Add the following infomation to the '<ThreadGroupName>_Queries.csv' file: [Header threads][Threads per engine][Total threads]. Default: false")}

{Lang("Create '<ThreadGroupName>_CursorSize.csv' file(s) within the '<OutputFolder>'.CSV will contains [Thread Group Name][Iteration][Date Start][Date End][Success][Engine name][Cursor Size] and detailed infomation about column and attributes size per query. Default: false")}
{Lang("Add columns where the size value is 0 on for all queries executed. Default: false")}
{Lang("Dump the Internal Query Log XML into '<OutputFolder>/<InternalQueryLog>/'. File name: 'internalquerylog_<ThreadGroupName>_<Iteration>.xml'. Default: false")}
{Lang("Minimum query processing time to dump Internal Query Log XML to dump folder. Value is in milliseconds. Default: 1000")}
{Lang("Dump the Internal Query Analysis XML into '<OutputFolder>/<InternalQueryAnalysis>/'. File name: 'internalqueryanalysis_<ThreadGroupName>_<Iteration>.xml'. Default: false")}
{Lang("Minimum query processing time to dump Internal Query Analysis XML to dump folder. Value is in milliseconds. Default: 1000")}
{Lang("Dump the Cursor into '<OutputFolder>/<Cursors>/'. File name: 'curosr_<ThreadGroupName>_<Iteration>.csv'. Default: false")}
{Lang("Minimum Cursor size to dump the Cursor to dump folder. Value is in megabyte. Default: 1")}
{Lang("Minimum query processing time to dump the Cursor to dump folder. Value is in milliseconds. Default: 1000")}

{Lang("Monitor Engine(s) activity for specified engines. Default: false. Create a 'EngineActivity.csv' file that contains [Engine] [Process Time] [Process CPUTime Ms] [Process CPUUserTime Ms] [Process CPUSystemTime Ms] [Process VMSize Gb] [Process WSSize Gb] [Process InstalledMemory Gb] [Process AvailableMemory Gb] [Queries AverageProcessingTime Ms] [Queries Throughput] [Overload] [IsRecoveringFromOverload] [Threads Working] [Threads Idle] ")}
{Lang("An Engine or a list of Engines activity to be monitored ")}
{Lang("Define the frequency to request activity from Engine(s). Value is in milliseconds. Default: 1000")}
{Lang("Dump Engine Activity XML files into '<OutputFolder>/<EngineActivity>/'. File name: 'activity_<engine_name>_<count>.xml'. Default: false")}
